Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: To determine the incidence of clinically significant adverse events after long - term , fixed - dose , generic highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) use among HIV - infected individuals in South India , we examined the experiences of 3154 HIV - infected individuals who received a minimum of 3 months of generic HAART between February 1996 and December 2006 at a tertiary HIV care referral center in South India .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "disease" entities mentioned in the paragraph:

1. HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus)
2. AIDS (Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome)
3. ART (Antiretroviral Therapy)
4. HAART (Highly Active Antiretroviral Therapy)

These are the diseases or conditions related to HIV infection that are mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Of course! Here are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph:

1. HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus)
2. AIDS (Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome)

These are the only disease entities mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the disease entities mentioned in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Disease |
| --- |
| HIV (Human Immunodeficiency Virus) |
| AIDS (Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
